TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 描述传入 对象的 HTTP 请求。

span.span: Describes an incoming HTTP request to an object.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端发出一个请求到统一资源标识符 (URI) 由对象，提供对象，其中包含有关发件人、 请求和发送到客户端的响应信息。When a client makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) handled by an object, the provides a object that contains information about the sender, the request, and the response that is sent to the client. 属性返回描述的请求的对象。The property returns the object that describes the request. 对象包含有关请求，如请求的信息字符串，字符串，并请求的正文数据 (请参阅属性)。The object contains information about the request, such as the request string, string, and request body data (see the property). 若要答复请求，你必须获取关联的响应使用属性。To reply to the request, you must get the associated response using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何接收并响应。The following code example demonstrates how to receive and respond to a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AcceptTypes As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AcceptTypes { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端接受的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets the MIME types accepted by the client.

value.span: 一个 数组，该数组包含在请求的 标头中指定的类型名称；如果客户端请求不包括 标头，则为 。

span.span: A array that contains the type names specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Accept`标头是一个空格分隔的多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 类型名称的字符串 (例如， `image/jpeg`)，指示客户端是准备好接受并处理在响应中的 MIME 类型。The `Accept` header is a string of space-separated Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type names (for example, `image/jpeg`), which indicate the MIME types that the client is prepared to accept and process in a response. `*/*`条目指示客户端接受任何 MIME 类型。The `*/*` entry indicates that the client accepts any MIME type. 有关的详细说明`Accept`标头，请参阅 RFC 2616，可用在[ http://www.rfc-editor.org ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a detailed description of the `Accept` header, see RFC 2616, available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org/). 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetClientCertificate(class System.AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGetClientCertificate (requestCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetClientCertificate(AsyncCallback ^ requestCallback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给回叫委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 开始对客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书的异步请求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request for the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.
An that indicates the status of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificateError As Integer
public: property int ClientCertificateError { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个错误代码，该代码标识的问题涉及客户端提供的 。

span.span: Gets an error code that identifies a problem with the provided by the client.

value.span: 包含 Windows 错误代码的 值。

span.span: An value that contains a Windows error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含返回通过安全通道 (Schannel) 安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI)，用于验证的证书的 Windows 错误代码。This property contains a Windows error code returned by the Secure Channel (Schannel) Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI), which is used to validate the certificate. 有关 Schannel 的 SSPI 支持的详细信息，请参阅"创建安全连接使用 Schannel"中的安全文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about SSPI support for Schannel, see "Creating a Secure Connection Using Schannel" in the Security documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查此属性以确定请求是否包含有效的客户端证书。The following code example checks this property to determine whether the request includes a valid client certificate. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#3)]

exception.span: 尚未通过调用 或 方法初始化客户端证书

span.span: The client certificate has not been initialized yet by a call to the or methods
-or -
The operation is still in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentEncoding As Encoding
public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ ContentEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于随请求发送的数据的内容编码

span.span: Gets the content encoding that can be used with data sent with the request

value.span: 一个 对象，适于 属性中的数据使用。

span.span: An object suitable for use with the data in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以用于将字节序列转换为字符集 （代码页） 和为字节序列的字符。An object can be used to convert byte sequences into character sets (code pages) and characters into byte sequences. 此属性使用的字符集的值从`Content-Type`标头来确定编码。This property uses the charset value from the `Content-Type` header to determine the encoding. 如果该信息不可用，此属性返回。If that information is not available, this property returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLength64 As Long
public: property long ContentLength64 { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的正文数据的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the body data included in the request.

value.span: 请求的 标头中的值。

span.span: The value from the request's header.

value.span: 如果内容长度未知，则此值为 -1。

span.span: This value is -1 if the content length is not known.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`标头提出请求附带的正文数据的长度，以字节为单位。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the body data that accompanies the request. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用时处理的正文数据的属性。The following code example uses the property while processing body data. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的正文数据的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets the MIME type of the body data included in the request.

value.span: ，包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端在请求中包括的正文数据，它声明中的正文数据的多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 类型`Content-Type`标头。If a client includes body data in a request, it declares the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the body data in the `Content-Type` header. 例如，从 Web 窗体使用返回的数据的默认 MIME 类型`POST`方法是`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。For example, the default MIME type of data returned from a Web form using the `POST` method is `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举和 RFC 2616，可用在[ http://www.rfc-editor.org ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration and RFC 2616, available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org/). 为 null 时没有`Content-Type`请求标头中的。The is null when there is no `Content-Type` header in the request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

summary.span: 获取随请求发送的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets the cookies sent with the request.

value.span: 包含伴随请求的 Cookie。

span.span: A that contains cookies that accompany the request.

value.span: 如果请求不包含 Cookie，则此属性返回空集合。

span.span: This property returns an empty collection if the request does not contain cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是从存储在本地 （客户端） 计算机的 Web 服务器的名称/值文本数据。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示与请求一起发送的 cookie 的值。The following code example displays the values of cookies sent with the request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 GetClientCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其中包含客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: A object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止，直至检索的证书。This method blocks until the certificate is retrieved.

exception.span: 对此方法的一个调用（以检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书）正在进行，因此无法进行对此方法的另一个调用。

span.span: A call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress and therefore another call to this method cannot be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> GetClientCertificateAsync() cil managed
Public Function GetClientCertificateAsync () As Task(Of X509Certificate2)

summary.span: 以异步操作检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate as an asynchronous operation.
Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回包含客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书的 对象。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成时检索的证书。The returned object will complete when the certificate has been retrieved. 如果此方法的调用来检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书正在进行，无法建立到此方法的另一次调用。If a call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress, then another call to this method cannot be made.

span.span: if the request has associated body data; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据发送到服务器使用的请求`POST`方法，例如，应具有实体主体。A request that sends data to the server using the `POST` method, for example, should have an entity body. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 获取在请求中发送的标头名称/值对的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of header name/value pairs sent in the request.

value.span: 包含的 HTTP 标头包括在请求中。

span.span: A that contains the HTTP headers included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求标头包含元数据信息。Request headers contain metadata information. 例如，标头可以包含客户端与服务器的资源的统一资源标识符 (URI)，由客户端，以及可接受的 MIME 响应正文中的数据的类型的用户代理的标识。For example, headers can contain the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server, the identity of the user agent employed by the client, and the acceptable MIME types for data in the response body. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的所有信息给定对象。The following code example displays all the information in a given object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#21)]

summary.span: 获取由客户端指定的 HTTP 方法。

span.span: Gets the HTTP method specified by the client.

value.span: 包含的方法用于请求中。

span.span: A that contains the method used in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 方法通常是 GET 或 POST，具体取决于客户端所需的操作。The HTTP method is typically GET or POST, depending on the action desired by the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStream As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ InputStream { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含由客户端发送的正文数据的流。

span.span: Gets a stream that contains the body data sent by the client.

value.span: 一个可读的 对象，该对象包含客户端在请求正文中发送的字节。

span.span: A readable object that contains the bytes sent by the client in the body of the request.

value.span: 如果没有随请求发送任何数据，则此属性返回 。

span.span: This property returns if no data is sent with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端将数据传输 (例如，使用 HTTP`POST`方法)，此方法返回的流包含的数据。If the client transmits data (for example, using the HTTP `POST` method), the stream returned by this method contains that data. > [!NOTE] > 关闭请求不会关闭此属性返回的流。Closing the request does not close the stream returned by this property. 当你不再需要该流时，你应通过调用关闭它方法。When you no longer need the stream, you should close it by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性读取与请求一起发送的数据。The following code example demonstrates using this property to read the data sent with a request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

span.span: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

public: property bool IsSecureConnection { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示用来发送请求的 TCP 连接是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 协议。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the TCP connection used to send the request is using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol.

value.span: 如果 TCP 连接使用的是 SSL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the TCP connection is using SSL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求的安全连接，客户端请求使用而不是。To request a secure connection, the client request uses instead of . 如果不使用 SSL 建立的连接，客户端接收，它提供有关错误的信息。If the connection cannot be established using SSL, the client receives a that provides information about the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeepAlive As Boolean
public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示客户端是否请求持久性连接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the client requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果连接应保持打开状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection should be kept open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 客户端和服务器预计在短时间内多次交换数据，持续性连接可允许客户以避免需要打开和关闭每个消息的 TCP 连接的开销，从而加快其通信。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short time period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 对于使用 HTTP/1.1 的客户端，此属性的默认值是`true`。For clients using HTTP/1.1, the default value for this property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的查询字符串。

span.span: Gets the query string included in the request.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含的查询数据包括在请求 中。

span.span: A object that contains the query data included in the request .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 URL 中，查询信息用问号 （？） 分隔的路径信息。In a URL, the query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?). 名称/值对之间用等号 （=） 分隔。Name/value pairs are separated by an equals sign (=). 若要访问作为单个字符串的查询数据，获取属性值从返回对象。To access the query data as a single string, get the property value from the object returned by . > [!NOTE] > 查询缺少等号 (示例： [ http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name ](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) ) 添加到`null`中的键。Queries without an equal sign (example: [http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) ) are added to the `null` key in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RawUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ RawUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 URL 信息（不包括主机和端口）。

span.span: Gets the URL information (without the host and port) requested by the client.

value.span: 包含此请求的原始 URL。

span.span: A that contains the raw URL for this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原始 URL 定义为以下的域信息的 URL 的一部分。The raw URL is defined as the part of the URL following the domain information. URL 字符串中`http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`，原始的 URL 是`/articles/recent.aspx`。In the URL string `http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`, the raw URL is `/articles/recent.aspx`. 如果存在，原始的 URL 包括查询字符串。The raw URL includes the query string, if present. 若要获取的主机和端口的信息，请使用属性。To obtain the host and port information, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RemoteEndPoint As IPEndPoint
public: property System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ RemoteEndPoint { System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取发出请求的客户端 IP 地址和端口号。

span.span: Gets the client IP address and port number from which the request originated.

value.span: 表示发出请求的 IP 地址和端口号。

span.span: An that represents the IP address and port number from which the request originated.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestTraceIdentifier As Guid
public: property Guid RequestTraceIdentifier { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 获取传入 HTTP 请求的请求标识符。

span.span: Gets the request identifier of the incoming HTTP request.

value.span: 对象，其中包含 HTTP 请求的标识符。

span.span: A object that contains the identifier of the HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServiceName As String
public: property System::String ^ ServiceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端通过请求发送的服务提供程序名称 (SPN)。

span.span: Gets the Service Provider Name (SPN) that the client sent on the request.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含客户端通过请求发送的 SPN。

span.span: A that contains the SPN the client sent on the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用属性以执行自定义服务提供名称 (SPN) 验证。An application could use the property to perform custom Service Provide Name (SPN) validation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransportContext As TransportContext
public: property System::Net::TransportContext ^ TransportContext { System::Net::TransportContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 。

span.span: Gets the for the client request.

value.span: 客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: A object for the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于检索的通道绑定令牌 (CBT)发送其中已使用 HTTPS。The property can be used to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) for an which was sent using HTTPS. 应用程序可以使用属性来执行自定义身份验证使用调用到本机 Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021)函数。An application could use the property to perform custom authentication using calls to the native Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021) function. 如果应用程序尝试从此检索的通道绑定令牌 (CBT)属性使用方法和不，则将引发。If an application attempts to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) from this property using the method and the is not , then the will throw . 重写使用内部实现的方法。The overrides the method with an internal implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object requested by the client.

value.span: 一个 对象，用于标识客户端请求的资源。

span.span: A object that identifies the resource requested by the client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性允许您获取中提供的所有信息对象。The property allows you to obtain all the information available from a object. 如果你需要知道仅 URI 请求的原始文本，请考虑使用属性改为。If you need to know only the raw text of the URI request, consider using the property instead. 属性为 null 如果从客户端无法分析。The property is null if the from the client could not be parsed. 属性指示如果而不是转换后的 URI 其中百分比编码的任何值都会转换，并执行其他任何规范化步骤使用原始的未转义的 URI。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当实例收到的请求通过`http.sys`服务，它创建提供的 URI 字符串的实例`http.sys`，并将数据公开为属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求 URI 字符串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 转换后的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是HTTP 请求的请求行中提供：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 通过提供的原始 URI`http.sys`上述，请求为"/ 路径 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示在通过网络发送后面的 HTTP 谓词的字符串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服务从使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 URI 的请求中提供的信息创建一个转换后的 URI 和要确定源服务器请求的主机标头应转发到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过比较中使用一组的已注册的 URI 前缀请求的信息。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. 为了能够将这些值进行比较，需要进行一些规范化到请求。In order to be able to compare those values, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于上面的转换后的 URI 的示例将为，如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服务结合属性值和请求行来创建转换后的 URI 中的字符串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外，`http.sys`和类还执行以下操作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将转换百分比编码为 utf-16 字符表示形式的非 ASCII 字符。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意，以及 Unicode 字符 （Unicode 编码使用 %uxxxx 格式） 支持 utf-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤，如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 请求不包含有关用于百分比编码值的编码的任何信息，因为它可能不能以确定正确的编码只是通过分析百分比编码值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供用于修改进程的两个注册表项：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零，`http.sys`接受仅 UTF 8 编码的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零，`http.sys`还接受在请求中的 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码的 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零，`http.sys`始终尝试解码 URL 为 utf-8 首先; 如果转换失败和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零，Http.sys 然后尝试对其进行解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果为零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零），`http.sys`尝试对其进行解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果该操作不成功，它会尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当收到请求时，它使用转换后的 URI 从`http.sys`作为输入到属性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 没有需要在 Uri 中支持除了字符和数字的字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 一个示例是下面的 URI，用于检索客户的客户信息数字"1/3812":An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (%2f) 中的百分号编码斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 因为在这种情况下包含斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符，这是必需的。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递给 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求的发送方的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果属性设置为 false，则当收到请求时，它使用的原始 URI 而不是转换后 URI`http.sys`作为输入到属性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UrlReferrer As Uri
public: property Uri ^ UrlReferrer { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将使客户端与服务器相关的资源的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server.

value.span: 对象，包含请求的 标头的文本；如果请求中不包含标头，则为 。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header, or if the header was not included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端具有遵循到请求的 URI 的超链接，可能包含其请求`Referrer`标识包含该超链接的资源的 URI 的标头。If a client has followed a hyperlink to the requested URI, its request might contain a `Referrer` header that identifies the URI of the resource that contained the hyperlink. 客户端可以伪造，或选择不存在标头。Clients can falsify or choose not to present a header. 因此，虽然属性可用于标识 Web 流量的基本趋势; 你不应使用它作为授权方案的一部分来控制对数据的访问。Therefore, while the property can be useful for identifying basic trends in Web traffic; you should not use it as part of an authorization scheme to control access to data. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 为 null 时没有`Referrer`请求标头中的时，或者当`Referrer`标头在请求中存在但不会分析为有效。The is null when there is no `Referrer` header in the request or when the `Referrer` header is present in the request but does not parse to a valid . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserAgent As String
public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端提供的用户代理。

span.span: Gets the user agent presented by the client.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `User-Agent`标头通常包含标识用于生成请求的软件的名称和版本数的文本。The `User-Agent` header typically contains text that identifies the name and version number of the software used to generate the request. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 为 null 时没有`User-Agent`请求标头中的。The is null when there is no `User-Agent` header in the request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserHostAddress As String
public: property System::String ^ UserHostAddress { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取请求定向到的服务器 IP 地址和端口号。

span.span: Gets the server IP address and port number to which the request is directed.

value.span: 包含主机地址信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the host address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的信息也是可用在属性值。The information returned by this property is also available in the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserHostName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserHostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由客户端指定的 DNS 名称和端口号（如果提供了端口号）。

span.span: Gets the DNS name and, if provided, the port number specified by the client.

value.span: 一个 值，其中包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A value that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Host`标头包含请求的服务器主机名和端口号，如果指定，分号分隔 (例如， `www.contoso.com:8080`)。The `Host` header contains the requested server host name and port number, if specified, separated by a colon (for example, `www.contoso.com:8080`). 你可以使用此属性返回不同的响应，具体取决于请求中指定的主机名。You can use this property to return different responses depending on the host name specified in the request. 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserLanguages As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ UserLanguages { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取响应的首选自然语言。

span.span: Gets the natural languages that are preferred for the response.

value.span: 数组，包含请求的 标头中指定的语言；如果客户端请求不包含 标头，则为 。

span.span: A array that contains the languages specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关的详细说明`Accept-Language`标头，请参阅 RFC 2616 部分 14.4，可用在[ http://www.rfc-editor.org ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a detailed description of the `Accept-Language` header, see RFC 2616 Section 14.4, available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org/). 请求标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示从请求的语言`Accept-Language`标头。The following code example displays the languages from the request's `Accept-Language` header. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]
